string-array.name: steps_paper_airplane
string-array.item: Fold bent corners in to center.

string-array.name: steps_stand_on_one_foot
string-array.item: How to stand on one foot
Stand in place on both feet.
Lift one foot into the air.
Wait for an unspecified amount of time.

string-array.name: steps_paper_cat
string-array.item: Fold a square piece of paper in half.
Fold in half to make a crease.
Fold in along the dotted line.
Fold in along the dotted lines.
